GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles sorted by date descending as default

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article relevant to provided article id

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: TheMitchFan

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments linked to an article by its ID sorted by newly created first as default

comments.body: Replacing the quiet elegance of the dark suit and tie with the casual indifference of these muted earth tones is a form of fashion suicide, but, uh, call me crazy — onyou it works.
comments.author: icellusedkars

comments.body: I carry a log — yes. Is it funny to you? It is not to me.
comments.author: A different Author

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Inserts a comment into the comment database linked to an article by the id number

requestFormatExample.body: This is the comment that will be posted

exampleResponse.commentPosted: My comment posted on an article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Increases or decreases an articles vote count selected by its id

articleUpdated.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
articleUpdated.author: TheMitchFan

DELETE, /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment from the database selected by its comment ID
